TopicTitle: Will There Be A New Planet And Moon In 0.17?

Articles.Content: There should be because it would be more interesting to use a 'hypersonic' parachute (like Curiosity) to slow down our velocity. Plz post more !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

There are new planets being added in 0.17, if you look over to this thread you can find out more about them.

Please search the forums a bit more before posting a thread in the future.

Thanks.
